dublin_core.dcvalue: Headache has been reported to be associated with mobile phone MP use in some individuals The causal relationship between headache associated with MP use HAMP and MP use is currently undetermined Identifying the clinical features of HAMP may help in clarifying the pathophysiology of HAMP and in managing symptoms of individuals with HAMP The aim of the present study is to describe the clinical features of HAMP
Clinical features of headache associated with mobile phone use: a cross-sectional study in university students.
